description: Adapts the response to reflect the perspective and concerns of a specific persona. This decorator helps explore how different stakeholders or personality types would view a situation or topic.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The specific persona or stakeholder role to adopt

parameters.name: traits
parameters.description: Key personality traits or characteristics of the persona

parameters.name: goals
parameters.description: Primary goals or concerns of the persona

examples.description: Response from the perspective of a specific stakeholder
examples.usage:
+++Persona(role=customer)
What are the implications of implementing a new subscription model?
examples.result: Analyzes the subscription model from a customer's perspective, focusing on value, convenience, and potential concerns

examples.description: Detailed persona with specific traits and goals
examples.usage:
+++Persona(role=senior software engineer, traits=[pragmatic,detail-oriented,experienced], goals=[code quality,maintainability,efficiency])
Evaluate the proposal to switch from monolith to microservices.
examples.result: Provides a detailed analysis of the monolith-to-microservices transition from the perspective of a pragmatic, detail-oriented senior engineer who prioritizes code quality and maintainability
